Накопичення знань

A WordPress plugin that brings Google's reCAPTCHA to Advanced Custom Fields

  • WordPress Plugin
  • Open Source

ACF reCAPTCHA is a WordPress plugin that adds a reCAPTCHA custom field type to the popular Advanced Custom Fields plugin.

This was my first open source project and I definitely learnt a lot from being solely responsible for the upkeep of the plugin, which has now 300+ active installs.

If you find it useful, do give it a positive review here!

Демо Переглянути на GitHub
Працює на Jekyll
